name: 01-badge-divtober-2022
title: 01. Badge  :  Divtober 2022
description: This is my first entry into #divtober. I've been watching from the sidelines for years but now that I am on sabbatical it seemed a perfect time to participate. The first day theme was "Badge" and seeing as how I felt like a newbie attending a month-long conference with so many wonderful CSS artists I wanted to learn from, I decided to make my first piece of art a conference badge. There is a time-lapse video of making this piece at https://youtu.be/XSkVSjxbkAA

There is a time-lapse video of making this piece at https://youtu.be/XSkVSjxbkAA */
